column1: Although a  strict interpretation has been preferred in earlier judgments in this
regard, I  find that  our Superior Courts  have lately moved  away  from the strict
interpretation rule and had thought it fit to interpret the relevant words in a fact
sensitive manner, considering the uniqueness of each case under consideration
A.W .A Salam,  J.  in  the  case  of  CA-PHC-108-2010 decided  on  26-08-2014,
considering the mode of proof of the words “all precautions to prevent”  as stated
in the proviso of section 40(1) of the Forest Ordinance observed as follows;
